actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to address the concept of "Too Big To Fail" with respect to certain financial entities.
short_title: Too Big to Fail, Too Big to Exist Act

summary.text: Too Big to Fail, Too Big to Exist Act - Instructs the Secretary of the Treasury to: (1) submit to Congress, within 90 days after enactment of this Act, a list of all commercial banks, investment banks, hedge funds, and insurance companies that the Secretary believes are too big to fail (" Too Big To Fail List"); and (2) break up entities included on such list so that their failure would no longer cause a catastrophic effect on the United States or global economy without a taxpayer bailout.

titles.title: Too Big to Fail, Too Big to Exist Act
A bill to address the concept of "Too Big To Fail" with respect to certain financial entities.
